info.name: Qidian International Dark Theme
info.description: Theme for Qidian International. Makes the entire site dark. Now works properly in normal (day) & sepia modes on the reader.
info.additionalInfo:
I've probably missed some stuff here and there, so let me know and I'll see if I can fix it! I try to update this style often when I find things I want/need to fix! :)
---
Last Update: 10/20/19 @ 3:21 AM EST
Version Log:
 • Version 2.9f - Fixed up some uncolored text and some links that were not properly underlined.
 • Version 2.9b - Fixed uncolored text on book page (Why do they keep changing this T^T)
 • Version 2.9a - Fixed underlining for chapter names.
 • Version 2.9 - Profile Settings page styled, Reader title bar fixed. -- Some other things might have broke as a result, please let me know if this is the case.
 • Version 2.8e - PPF Page styled, Badges & Profile pages fixed.
 • Version 2.8b - Fixed 'Browse' Color, Novels from the Power Rankings title color on the home page and novel scores.
 • Version 2.8a - Now works if the url doesn't have 'www' in it.
 • Version 2.8 - Styled power stone ranking page, inbox/notification page, and fixed some font coloring on book pages.
 • Version 2.7d - Fixed spoilers in novel reviews & fixed coloring of next/prev review page.
 • Version 2.7c - Fixed search page.
 • Version 2.7b - Styled Vote Page and made slight changes to the ToC in the reader.
 • Version 2.7a - Fixed name colors in chapter comments on the reader.
 • Version 2.7 - Styled Login Page (incl. Login w/ Email)
 • Version 2.6a - Fixed coloring of review details + 'View More' links.
 • Version 2.6 - Fixed style on the search page.
 • Version 2.5a - Change the color for 'more' links. Probably missed a lot of them though. (Suggestion from a friend of mine)
 • Version 2.5 - Rewrote most of style. Also change some stuff on the main page, categories page and history page.
 • Version 2.0 - Main Site/Novel Pages now look much better!
 • Version 1.5a - Fixed Menu Bar (Main Site & Reader)
 • Version 1.5 - Fixed Normal/Sepia Reader
 • Version 1.4 - Fixed Novel Pages (Background & Font Color)
 • Version 1.3 - Released.
